info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 9:31PM CDT until July 14 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL COOK COUNTY... At 931 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over East Garfield Park, or over West Town, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 to 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Chicago, Cicero, Arlington Heights, Evanston, Schaumburg, Palatine, Skokie, Des Plaines, Orland Park, Tinley Park, Oak Lawn, Berwyn, Mount Prospect, Hoffman Estates, Oak Park, Glenview, Ohare Airport, Streamwood, Hanover Park and Wheeling. This includes... Brookfield Zoo, Lincoln Park Zoo, Loyola University, Oakton Community College, Schaumburg Boomers Baseball, SeatGeek Stadium, Triton College, University of Chicago, Windy City Thunderbolts Baseball, Harper College, Hawthorne Park, Northeastern Illinois University, Northwestern University, Soldier Field, University of Illinois Chicago, Guaranteed Rate Field...IL Institute of Technology, Wrigley Field, The Loop, Museum of Science and Industry, Museum Campus, and Northerly Island. Including the following interstates... I-55 between mile markers 282 and 294. I-57 between mile markers 353 and 358. I-90 between mile markers 63 and 105. I-94 between mile markers 30 and 66. I-290 between mile markers 1 and 4, and between mile markers 20 and 29. I-294 between mile markers 30 and 66. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
